dp:metadata.dc:title: The winner
dp:metadata.dc:creator: David Baldacci
dp:metadata.dc:description: EDITORIAL REVIEW: From the author of the phenomenally bestselling "Absolute Power" and "Total Control" comes a thrilling new novel of suspense and excitement. When LuAnn Tyler is asked to be part of a crooked lottery scheme, she refuses, even though it would mean millions of dollars. But when she is framed for murder, the single mother is forced to participate. Ten years later, it all comes back to haunt her Major national media ads & publicity (Espionage/Thriller)
